title: Validation of smartwatch-based blood pressure monitoring in young adults: Multi-perspective analysis by dual comparison with cuff-based devices
details: Y Lee, T Lee, J Lee, HY Lee, JM Seo - IEEE Access, 2025
abstract: Smartwatches have become popular for blood pressure estimation, offering continuous monitoring with advanced convenience. However, clinical guidelines have not fully endorsed their use due to validation concerns. Many studies have …
